scripts.coverage:merge: mkdir -p .nyc_output coverage && (test -f packages/frontend/coverage/coverage-final.json && cp packages/frontend/coverage/coverage-final.json .nyc_output/frontend.json || true) && (test -f packages/backend/coverage/coverage-final.json && cp packages/backend/coverage/coverage-final.json .nyc_output/backend.json || true) && nyc merge .nyc_output .nyc_output/coverage-final.json
scripts.coverage: pnpm run coverage:merge && pnpm run coverage:report
